H0.text: A balance is the most useful tool for studying the living organisms that students collected from the pond.

H1.text: A pH meter is the most useful tool for studying the living organisms the students collected from the pond.

H2.text: Microscope is the most useful tool for studying the living organisms that the students collected from the pond.

H3.text: A thermometer is the most useful tool for studying the living organisms the students collected from the pond.

A4.text: Microscope is a laboratory instrument used to examine objects that are too small to be seen by the naked eye.

A5.text: Microscopy is the science of investigating small objects and structures using a microscope.
